name: Dollar Collector #2
description:
This is Dollar Collector #2. So if you haven't already, go play part 1 here: https://ryanmouse.itch.io/dollar-collector.

Now if you have, the rules for part 2 are......

Collect 100 dollars to win!

Arrow keys or WASD to move the player.

Each time you go over a 10 dollar bill, you get 10 dollars.

Each time you go over a 20 dollar bill, you get 20 dollars.

Each time you go over a 50 dollar bill, you get 50 dollars.

Blue platforms are just solid to make sure you stay in the designated paths.

Each time you go over taxes, you lose a dollar.

If you go into negatives, you automatically restart.

If you reach the end and want to play again, click "r" to restart.

Enjoy the game? Follow me and comment! I would really appreciate it!

Note: Also, this game is more of a suspenseful and decision making type game (compared to Dollar Collector #1).

You must make a decision to go right, left, up, or down. Can you make 100 dollars?
